wikipedia_page.main: Chris Harrison (Christopher Matthew Harrison, born 1967 in Jarrow) is an English photographer known for his work which has explored ideas of home, histories and class.

response: Christopher or Chris Harrison may also refer to:
* Chris Harrison (born 1971), American television presenter best known as the longtime host of The Bachelor for its first 25 seasons
* Chris Harrison (baseball coach), former American baseball coach
* Chris Harrison, a character in Flash Forward
* Chris Harrison (computer scientist) (born 1984), British-born professor of human–computer interaction
* Chris Harrison (American football) (born 1972), American football guard

link_mentions.page: List of alumni of the Royal College of Art

response: *Numbered Portraits - George Garland cur. Val Williams pub. Photoworks (1996)  invited artists Joachim Schmid, Chris Harrison and Susan Lipper to respond to WSRO George Garland Collection portraits; taken from thousands of photographs from his studio in Petworth of the rural England that he knew would soon disappear.https://shop.photoworks.org.uk/products/numbered-portraits-george-garlandUniversity of the Arts London research project http://ualresearchonline.arts.ac.uk/6476/
